entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Local blowing snow in Forillon Park. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 except northwest 50 gusting to 80 in Forillon Park. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
